channel.description: CIS 527 Lab 3 - Network Monitoring with Wireshark Wireshark Originally Named Ethereal Packet Capturing Software Sniff & Analyze Network Packets Understand Packet Structure & Encapsulation !! WARNING !! DO NOT USE ON K-STATE'S NETWORK Monitoring Network Traffic Violates K-State's IT Policy! Use Within your VM Network Only! Installation https://www.wireshark.org/download.html sudo apt install wireshark
